title: Can we still get the icon if the Alpha wouldn't let us log in for the last few days?
body:
I've been consistently using the Alpha client for all of my gameplay for an extended period of time.

Then preseason came.

The client would constantly bugsplat upon opening after the patch and Player Support has yet to get in touch with me. Since Riot said they'd be handing out icons if we played on the Alpha client once from November 10th or so until November 14th, I'm unsure if I'd be eligible for the icon.

:( If not, I'd be sad, because I was a loyal tester. I'd hate to miss out because of bugsplats on launch for the past week.

replies.body:
As far as I know, so long as you logged into the Alpha at some point between when it launched and Nov. 15th, you should get the icon. We're still sending them out until the end of the month, so if you don't have it by the first of December, let us know. ^.^

Let me know if you have any questions.
